desserts.name: Chocolate Cake
desserts.description: A great, everyday Chocolate Cake - the cake recipe I make most often. Tender, moist crumb, truly tastes of chocolate, one bowl and a whisk.

desserts.name: Midnight Velvet Cake
desserts.description: Dive into decadence with the Midnight Velvet Cake, a luxurious treat that marries the rich darkness of velvety chocolate with the delicate sweetness of mascarpone cream.
